name: Cross Sky High
description:
Cross Sky High takes on the challenge to beat the renowned Crossy Road Game

Do you think Cross Sky High can beat Crossy Road? Have your say here

EXPERIENCE BRAND NEW EASY AND FUN SKY HEIGHT CROSSING
If you like that Crossy Game, you are going to love this game. But, don't get it the wrong way, Cross Sky High is a completely different and unique crossing game where you need to get the characters across, with each move your character makes, the platform from where your character stand will be affected and get transformed differently, it will not always be a straight forward crossing, rather some degree of planning ahead and/or puzzle solving is sometimes involved. So, try not to get your character trapped, and most importantly, try not to fall. Come now and join the fun and challenging game plays to find out more.

MORE THAN 40 CUTE AND HILARIOUS CHARACTERS TO UNLOCK
There are currently more than 40 unique and fun characters to be unlocked and collected in Cross Sky High. Each will have different affect on the platform while playing, and different difficulty level as well as score rewards, making your game play experience totally different each time you play with any of them. Unlock and collect them all, and use them well to aid you achieve better scores

CONNECT WITH THE PLAYERS AROUND THE WORLD AND BEAT THEM WITH YOUR HIGH SCORES
Find a best way to use your characters well to achieve higher scores, unload them the leaderboard and beat the ones on top. Let's see who is the king of Cross Sky High.

A EASY BREEZY GAME FOR ALL AGES
Play the game with your friends and family. Share your high scores on Facebook. Don't let your friend got higher score than you and your characters
